synopsis.text: Outside a snow-covered mountain village in Japan, a young boy named Kanta and his beloved grandfather reside. When his grandfather falls ill and their firewood supply dwindles, Kanta bravely decides to venture out to the woodshed to gather more. Despite his fear of the eerie woodshed, especially at midnight, Kanta summons his courage and embarks on the journey. Along the way, he comes to appreciate the importance of firewood and the depth of his grandfather's love. In the end, Kanta makes a small but significant discovery that warms his heart. This touching puppet animation is brought to you by the creator of "Norman the Snowman: Kita no Kuni no Aurora Kari."
